nodes.text: The mind spider was a behemothan beast of extraordinary proportions. They were known to support themselves, standing upright on their abdomens, by anchoring eight crystalline appendages into earthen canyon walls around them.
The mind spider has yet to be properly categorized, some feeling it to be a spider, others a slug-like species.
One specimen in its larval stage was used as the base of Krake Data Vault on Krake's Planet.
Another gargantuan spider is the Beast in the Mouth of the Mountain of Endor.
